H0.text: On which part of the body would a Japanese person wear a geta. Hand

H1.text: On which part of the body would a Japanese person wear a geta. Elbow

H2.text: On which part of the body would a Japanese person wear a geta. Knee

H3.text: On which part of the body would a Japanese person wear a geta. Foot

A4.text: geta have a flat wooden base held on the foot with a fabric thong

A5.text: Geta are worn with the foot overhanging the back and a finger-width of space between the strap and the skin webbing between the toes
